name: Looking Glass (yssal, LukeGabriel)
description:
You're little Tino.

Suddenly he finds himself lost in two alternative realities, where everything is upside down and separated by a strange, weird looking glass. Will you help Tino find the key and escape from this nightmare?

Gameplay WASD = move 
Spacebar = switch reality
esc = pause

In the game there are two realities:

  • White: the "normal" reality
  • Red: you can see the world in its true colors

In both realities you should pay attention; you can feel that something in the dark is watching you...

Developed for Extra Credits Game Jam #5 2019 Programming by LukeGabriel - Graphics by yssal - Music by ManWithAGuitar
